     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Environmental Science II &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16742960">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16742960">
          <p>
           Rachel Hamelers, Science Subject Specialist
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="mailto:rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu">
            rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           (484) 664-3601
          </p>

       <div id="wrapbox16742543">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16742543">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16742543">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News - Allentown and beyond
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16742543">
          <div id="boxatt16742543" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19776525">
              <a id="link_19776525" href="http://news.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776525,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776525}); ">
               Google news
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Aggregated news from worldwide sources
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776485">
              <a id="link_19776485" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776485,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369574}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776462">
              <a id="link_19776462" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/morningcall/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776462,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12600323}); ">
               Morning Call
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of articles from the Allentown-based Morning Call newspaper.  Coverage from 1984 to 1 day ago.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23576209">
              <a id="link_23576209" href="http://www.nytimes.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23576209,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23576209}); ">
               New York Times
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Complete access to New York Times via Muhlenberg subscription. All users must register while physically on campus, using their Muhlenberg email.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776483">
              <a id="link_19776483" href="http://www.wfmz.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776483,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776483}); ">
               WFMZ-TV 69 News
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Local TV news station covering the Lehigh Valley as well as other parts of Eastern PA and Western NJ
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16742547">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16742547">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16742547">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Journal Articles and Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16742547">
          <div id="boxatt16742547" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23576214">
              <a id="link_23576214" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://pubs.acs.org/action/showPublications?display=journals" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23576214,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12325172}); ">
               American Chemical Society Web Editions
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Abstracts and some full-text of peer-reviewed research journals in the chemical and related sciences
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776716">
              <a id="link_19776716" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discovery" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776716,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776716}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To find only articles, use the Article limit on the left sidebar of your search results page.  Use the Peer-reviewed limit to narrow further to scholarly sources that have been peer-reviewed.  Some full text is linked directly; otherwise, use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23576215">
              <a id="link_23576215" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23576215,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22488751}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access search engine that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly" on the free web. Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Be sure to check library catalog to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776837">
              <a id="link_19776837" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776837,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286439}); ">
               Science Direct, Health, Life, and Physical Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences from 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776843">
              <a id="link_19776843" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.springerlink.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776843,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286445}); ">
               Springerlink
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 1,700 journals from Springer-Verlag with coverage from 1997 to present. Subjects covered focus on the natural sciences, but also include significant titles in behavioral sciences, humanities, social sciences and law.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16742836">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16742836">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16742836">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           United States Statistics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16742836">
          <p>
           This is a list of selected multi-purpose resources.&nbsp; For additional recommendations by topic, see the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385">
            Finding Statistics and Data: Topical Sources
           </a>
           guide.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16742836" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19776661">
              <a id="link_19776661" href="http://factfinder2.census.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776661,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776661}); ">
               American Factfinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database from the U.S. Census Bureau with population, housing, and business statistics at the country, state, county, city, and zip code levels.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776663">
              <a id="link_19776663" href="http://fedstats.sites.usa.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776663,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776663}); ">
               FedStats
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to official statistical information produced by the U.S. federal government.  Browse by topic or agency or search across agency websites.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776665">
              <a id="link_19776665" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://hsus.cambridge.org/HSUSWeb/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776665,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776665}); ">
               Historical Statistics of the United States
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistics from colonial times to modern day covering population, work and welfare, economic structure and performance, economic sectors, and governance and international relations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776662">
              <a id="link_19776662" href="http://www.icpsr.umich.edu/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776662,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776662}); ">
               ICPSR (Inter-University Consortium for Political and Social Research)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A data archive of more than 500,000 files of research in the social sciences. Specialized collections of data in education, aging, criminal justice, substance abuse, terrorism, and other fields.  Full access available only to Muhlenberg faculty, students, and staff who create accounts using their Muhlenberg email addresses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776668">
              <a id="link_19776668" href="http://lehighvalleyresearch.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776668,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776668}); ">
               Lehigh Valley Research Consortium
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Collects quantitative and qualitative data on the Lehigh Valley on: demographics, public opinion , economic indicators, non-profit sector, governmental sector, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776667">
              <a id="link_19776667" href="http://pasdc.hbg.psu.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776667,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776667}); ">
               Pennsylvania State Data Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Official source of demographic and economic data for Pennsylvania.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776664">
              <a id="link_19776664" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/statistical" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776664,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599240}); ">
               ProQuest Statistical Insight
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistical information produced by U.S. federal agencies, states, and intergovernmental organizations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19776666">
              <a id="link_19776666" href="http://www.census.gov/compendia/statab/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19776666,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776666}); ">
               Statistical Abstract of the United States
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The authoritative and comprehensive summary of statistics on the social, political, and economic organization of the United States.  Current and archived editions (1995- ) are available online, as well.   Old print editions (1886- ) are in the Trexler Library Government Documents section starting at C 3.134:886.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16878880">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16878880">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16878880">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Helpful Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16878880">
          <div id="boxatt16878880" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19916910">
              <a id="link_19916910" href="http://stoptheburn.org" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19916910,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19916910}); ">
               Allentown Residents for Clean Air
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19916882">
              <a id="link_19916882" href="http://www.sustainlv.org/act-locally/calls-to-action/allentown-waste-to-energy-plan/ #EIS4EVA" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19916882,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19916882}); ">
               Alliance for Sustainable Communities
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Allentown "Waste to Energy" page
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19944131">
              <a id="link_19944131" href="http://www.google.com/url?sa=t&amp;rct=j&amp;q=&amp;esrc=s&amp;source=web&amp;cd=3&amp;cad=rja&amp;uact=8&amp;ved=0CC8QFjAC&amp;url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.lvaic.org%2Fassets%2Fbase%2Fpdf%2FLVRCReport2013-14FINALlores.pdf&amp;ei=2c-3VIC5LbKOsQS14YGgBQ&amp;usg=AFQjCNHmoPF72Zcrfh92LFU7y53F-V9eZg&amp;sig2=i-lvuJYnG9rvPrcJ2yQO-Q&amp;bvm=bv.83640239,d.cWc" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19944131,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19944131}); ">
               State of the Lehigh Valley 2013-2014
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">

             </li>
             <li id="link23576269">
              <a id="link_23576269" href="http://www.epa.gov" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23576269,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science II', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23576269}); ">
               US Environmental Protection Agency
